ValidationRule.description: Allows user to select Extra Cover only if the related Case Article has extra cover
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( (!CONTAINS("Extra Cover:ACL:T&C Cover",TEXT(Cover_Type__c)) && HasExtraCover__c = true), (CONTAINS("Extra Cover",TEXT(Cover_Type__c))&& HasExtraCover__c = false) ) && CONTAINS("EFT:Account_Credit:Money_Order",RecordType.DeveloperName)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the related article has Extra Cover only Extra Cover and ACL can be chosen (and T&C Cover if the value does not exceed $100)
